description.value: This CapabilityStatement describes the minimal requirements for a client/server to fulfill the 'Retrieve/Serve medication data' transaction in all non-MedMij contexts within Medication Process 9 (MP9) version 3.0.0. See [Landingspagina Medicatieproces](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Medicatieproces) for additional information.

purpose.value: This CapabilityStatement is informative in nature and does not represent the minimum or maximum set of capabilities the client or server should support. The aim is to design the CapabilityStatement as complete as possible, however for the exact set of capabilities the implementation guide of the corresponding information standard should be consulted.
